activities: Cloud security provider processing email and electronic files containing personal information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Bitglass electronically collects customer data including  name, billing and mailing address, phone number, e-mail address, date of birth, as well as other non-public information about that is associated with or linked to any of that data.
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU DPAs and the Swiss FDPIC; for all other data we utilize the BBB EU Safe Harbor Program, which is operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus].  If you feel that we have not satisfactorily addressed your complaint, you can visit the BBB EU Safe Harbor Program web site at http://www.bbb.org/council/eusafeharbor/bbb-eu-safe-harbor-dispute-resolution-program/how-to-file-a-complaint-with-bbb-eu-safe-harbor/ for more information on how to file a complaint.
